title: IAA Tonight | Tom Brady Gets Fined AND Russell Westbrook Comes Off the Bench
description: Tom Brady was fined for trying to trip Grady Jarrett during Sunday's game, but should he have been suspended instead? Justin Fields is seemingly becoming more frustrated with the Bears after a tough loss on Thursday Night to the Commanders. Why aren't the Bears doing as much as they can to surround their QB with talent. Plus, what is going on with Russ and the Lakers?
author: smanderville@houseofathlete.com (Leger Douzable, Chantel Tremetiere, Antoine Walker)
